body:
Comment 2: 
I am able to reproduce this issue: 6g, Ubuntu 10.04 64-bit, hg id 714da1923296 tip.
After patching CL 2447042, the program still hangs repeatedly.

However, the first time I ran the program after applying the CL it failed with a signal
28 (see attached). Since I've been unable to reproduce it, this may be a meaningless
outlier.
Attachments: 1. mprsvbug.txt (5220 bytes)
